headline: American Tower Corporation Declares Quarterly Distribution
summary: BOSTON, September 18, 2025--American Tower Corporation (NYSE: AMT) announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash distribution of $1.70 per share on shares of the Company’s common stock. The distribution is payable on October 20, 2025 to the stockholders of record at the close of business on September 30, 2025.
